name: Xavi
description: '''Joshua Xavier Gutierrez Alonso''' (born {{Birth based on age as of date|19|2023|12|15|noage=yes}}), known professionally as '''Xavi''', is an American [[singer-songwriter]] of [[regional Mexican]] music, who rose to prominence in 2023 through his singles "[[La VÃ­ctima]]" and "[[La Diabla (Xavi song)|La Diabla]]", which would go viral on [[TikTok]] and eventually lead to the singer's debut on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]]. Between the release of both singles, "Poco a Poco" with Los Dareyes de la Sierra and "Modo DND" with Tony Aguirre were released and performed similarly in charts.
